footer.intro: Are you interested in our services?

profileSection.title: <1>About</1> Us
profileSection.description: CATECH is a company from El Salvador with the purpose of serving all businesses that need to implement software development or digital marketing projects or as well, renew their corporate image and automate their processes. Our professional team will achieve your goals satisfactorily because we prioritize the creativity and quality in our work. Our goal is to provide you  with the necessary digital tools and the consultancy to empower you in this digital world, we seek that you company can be scalable, competitive and efficient.

missionStatement.title: Mission
missionStatement.description: Offer and deliver creative and innovative technological solutions, adaptable to the needs of our clients in El Salvador and Central America, promoting their development and productivity, through a team of highly competitive ICT professionals.

visionStatement.title: Vision
visionStatement.description: To be a competitive company that innovates the region with IT services and products that significantly improve the productivity of SMEs, recognized in the Central American region for the solutions we deliver, generating lasting relationships with customers, suppliers and our people.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Our team not only make software. They solves high level solutions

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We want to go one step further, creating products that make the difference, that innovate

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: We are a creative team that seeks to make your idea unique

servicesPage.intro: Everything you need to take your company to the next level

methodology.title: How do we proceed?
methodology.description: We take care of each part od the project with agile methodologies, which allow us to deliver value products with transparency and assertive communication between our collaborators and clients throughout the procces

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: The market is becoming more global y the competition is stronger. Surely, that comeptition already has its professional website. Your corporate image and your website are the visible face of your brand, so they have to be current and powerful. With a good work on the web and applying some marketing techniques online, you'll see how new clients begin contact you

1.title: Setting objectives
1.description: We try to understand all of the client's requirements in detail to make sure of deliver a project that fits all their needs. With all the client's insights, we help to align the project assumptions with real user expectations and suggest different options to build the project

2.title: UX & UI Wireframing
2.description: CATECH branding experts improves and helps to define your company does better, in a way that makes it irresistible to your customers. We work side by side with our clients to develop and evaluate ideas together

3.title: Web Development
3.description: With the approved flowchart, it’s time for our web developers to make their magic! The development process starts with all the previously discussed graphic elements, content and design. Our team communicates with our clients throughout the process, making iteratives deliveries of valuable products.

digitalMarketing.title: Marketing Digital
digitalMarketing.description: We build modern and effective campaigns with our extensive knowledge in tech, culture and marketing. We implement Inbound Marketing strategies, remarketing, monitoring proccess and metric analysis

1.title: Inbound Marketing
1.description: We create high queality strategies with the lastest technological trends, boosting your brand with attractive campaigns and an Inbound Marketing Methodology. Our team orchestrates commercial perfomance by setting KPIs (Key Performance Indicator) to ensure the best results.

2.title: Budget
2.description: We provide a Marketing Budget Plan focused on the social media platforms that the client previously selected. Once the strategy is approved, we set up a team of strategists, content managers and designers to take control of the content creation, design, and customer support of your social media channels

3.title: KPI tracking
3.description: To demonstrate how effectively our company is achieving measurable results, we establish different key performance indicators (KPIs). Our clients keep track of these indicators and are constantly updated on the performance of the campaigns.

branding.title: Branding
branding.description: In CATECH we create the personality that your company needs to connect with your audience. Our goal is see you grow and make your brand unique.

1.description: We try to understand all of the client's requirements in detail to make sure of deliver a project that fits all their needs. With the clients's perception we proceed to the conceptualization of the branding: values, strengths, passions, style, personality and brand experience
